verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: sees] [ARG1: its " zero - tolerance " policy] [ARG2: as a deterrent] , but most immigrant families have no idea it exists .
The Trump administration sees its " zero - tolerance " policy as a deterrent , but [ARG0: most immigrant families] [V: have] [ARG1: no idea it exists] .
The Trump administration sees its " zero - tolerance " policy as a deterrent , but most immigrant families have no idea [ARG1: it] [V: exists] .
